title: video communication web app
description: A real-time video communication application built using React and WebRTC. The platform allows users to connect and communicate via video calls in a user-friendly interface.

title: BoxerNet
description: A Django web application that allows users to create, view, edit, and delete articles related to boxers. The platform aims to provide a space for sharing information and insights about boxers.

title: School dashboard
description: A student management dashboard allowing users to view and manage subjects, classes, and students. Build with React, and uses NodeJS and Express.

title: AI Object Detective app
description: A cross-platform Augmented Reality (AR) application that combines object recognition with interactive AR content. The app utilizes machine learning to recognize objects in the real world through the device's camera.

title: E-Commerce Website
description: An e-commerce platform built using Sanity.io and Next.js, offering seamless shopping experiences.

title: Real-Time Chat App
description: A real-time chat app using React.js for the frontend and Node.js for the backend.

title: Football Fans Web App
description: A web app where users can search for their favorite teams, save them, and access information such as team details, standings, and top scorers.

title: Gamification Tool
description: A tool developed with Laravel to enhance user engagement and motivation through points, challenges, and other gamification features.

title: Anime Tracker
description: A web app where users can insert the anime they have seen, manage entries, and delete them if needed.

title: Element Identification App
description: A Kotlin app that identifies elements based on characteristics. Users answer questions via a text interface, guided by a traits database.

title: Park Management Tool
description: Manage an amusement park with features like adding, editing, deleting attractions, tracking maintenance, handling breakdowns, and managing categories.
